content: the **windowpane granny stitch blanket** is a beautiful blend of modern design and classic crochet charm this versatile pattern features a simple construction comprising three sections a top and bottom section made with eye-catching windowpane granny squares and a center section utilizing the timeless granny stitch we all know and love with 7 different sizes to choose from this blanket is perfect for everything from baby gifts to bedspreads this crochet blanket pattern includes crochet stitch charts printable color-your-own chart planner video tutorial crochet hook h 5 0mm - or size to meet gauge 1 notions removable stitch markers 2 yarn needle to weave in ends 3 scissors 4 yarn herrschners worsted 8 5 100% acrylic 489yds/226g colorways shown sleet color a ivory color b glacier color c & clay color d lion brand ferris wheel 6 100% acrylic 70yds/85g colorway vintage carousel with herrschners worsted 8 in white yardage 1025-3960 yds - will depend on preferred size yarn substitutions brava 7 100% premium acrylic 218yds/100g mary maxim maximum value 8 100% acrylic 474yds/227g red heart roll with it 9 389yds/150g with red heart super saver 10 389yds/150g abbreviations blo - back loop only chain s - chain s double_crochet - double_crochet dtr - treble_crochet ctochet rs - right side single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es stsc - stacked single_crochet 11 ws - wrong side yo - yarn over gauge 13 sts and 8 row = 4 by 4 in granny st pattern not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 12 sizes 7 size options finished measurements and total yardage included in schematic skill level advanced beginner let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 13 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 14 facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 15 community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ 16 pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 17 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw 18 when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns it is much appreciated and loved © 2025 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are the property of briana k designs the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to briana k designs is not only greatly appreciated but smiled upon no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from briana kepner 1 https //shrsl com/3vjm6 2 https //shrsl com/3xv7g 3 https //shrsl com/2bor2 4 https //shrsl com/2cibs 5 https //shrsl com/4szuo 6 https //shrsl com/4vrn8 7 https //shrsl com/2cpuz 8 https //shrsl com/4myi6 9 https //shrsl com/4vuhl 10 https //shrsl com/4vuhs 11 https //brianakdesigns com/stacked-single-crochet/ 12 https //brianakdesigns com/what-is-crochet-gauge-and-how-to-fix-it/ 13 http //www brianakdesigns com/ 14 https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 15 https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 16 https //www facebook com/groups/brianak 17 https
